name: Nisa Text Splitter
description:
Easy way to split your text/list into small text pieces.


- Smart Split (horizontally and vertically)

- Split with symbols or regex

- Split to columns (Use 2 line-breakers to split column)

- Split word

- Group by alphabet

- Keep styles after text splitting

- Remove duplicates / Sort / Reverse / Shuffle

- Re-join them back

- Wrap into Auto layout


Feel free to contact me to offer your idea for the plugins.
